TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 通过工作流实例的 提供对 SQL 数据库中保留的跟踪数据的访问。

span.span: Provides access to tracking data maintained in a SQL database by the for a workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 对象由调用返回到 和 ，并且通过特定工作流实例的 提供对 SQL 数据库中保留的跟踪数据的访问。 objects are returned by a call to both and and provide access to the tracking data maintained in a SQL database by the for a specific workflow instance. 类针对保留集合的数据库的属性优化对数据库的访问。The class optimizes its access to the database for its properties, which maintain collections. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] 。 . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取有关所显示工作流的列表中包含的所有 对象的信息。The following code example shows how to obtain information about all objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. 代码为 `ListViewItem` 变量中的每个 创建一个 `displayedWorkflows`。The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. 每个 都包含 、 和 属性的字符串表示形式。Each contains a string representation of the , the and properties. 然后，它将该项添加到 `workflowStatusList`。It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. 代码使用以前命名的属性值和 属性的字符串版本来创建同样会添加到 `WorkflowStatusInfo` 的新 `workflowStatusList` 对象。The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`. 此代码示例摘自 Mainform.cs 文件中的工作流监视器 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [工作流监视器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。 [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActivityEvents As IList(Of ActivityTrackingRecord)

summary.span: 获取活动跟踪记录的列表，这些记录已由运行时跟踪基础结构为此工作流实例发送到 数据库。

span.span: Gets the list of activity tracking records that have been sent for this workflow instance to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

value.span: 运行时跟踪基础结构为此工作流实例发送到跟踪数据库的 对象的列表。

span.span: The list of objects sent for this workflow instance to the tracking database by the run-time tracking infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true`， 将包含到目前为止为此工作流实例发送的所有活动跟踪记录；如果 为 `false`， 将包含到上一次 之前为止发送的活动跟踪记录。If is `true`, contains all activity tracking records sent for this workflow instance up to the current time; if is `false`, contains the activity tracking records sent up until the last . 包含运行时跟踪基础结构为此工作流实例发送到数据库的活动跟踪记录。 contains activity tracking records sent to a database by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance. 仅当工作流实例发出与在实例的 中指定的 相对应的活动状态事件时，工作流运行时引擎跟踪基础结构才会发送活动跟踪记录。Activity tracking records are sent by the workflow run-time engine tracking infrastructure only when the workflow instance emits an activity status event that corresponds to an specified in the for the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoRefresh { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否应在访问此 的属性数据时自动更新该数据。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether property data for this should be automatically updated when it is accessed.

value.span: 如果应在访问属性数据时自动刷新该数据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if property data should be automatically refreshed when it is accessed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了优化数据库性能，保留已查询数据集合的属性（比如 ）只有在访问属性时才会在数据库中查询新元素，并且只有在访问属性时才会根据需要更新此类属性的集合。To optimize database performance, properties that maintain collections of queried data, such as , query the database for new elements only when the property is accessed, and the collection for such a property is only updated on an as-required basis when the property is accessed. 类维护每个属性的两个时间戳： 一个指示的时间的集合跟踪数据上次加载，以及另一个指示上次刷新。The class maintains two timestamps for each property: one that indicates the time that tracking data for the collection was last loaded, and another that indicates the last time the was refreshed. 当您获取某个集合属性时， 将加载在上次加载集合跟踪数据和上次刷新 之间添加到数据库的任何跟踪数据，并将此数据添加到属性保留的集合。When you get one of the collection properties, the loads any tracking data that was added to the database between the last time tracking data for the collection was loaded and the last time the was refreshed and adds this data to the collection maintained by the property. 然后，指示上次为属性加载数据的时间戳将设置为指示上次刷新的时间戳的值。The timestamp that indicates the last time data was loaded for the property is then set to the value of the timestamp that indicates the last refresh. 如果这两个时间戳相等，则在访问属性时不会为属性加载附加跟踪数据。If these two timestamps are equal, additional tracking data is not loaded for the property when it is accessed. 将 设置为 `true`，以在每次访问集合属性时执行刷新，并确保在由该属性保留的集合中返回的跟踪数据始终保持最新。Set to `true` to perform a refresh every time a collection property is accessed and ensure that the tracking data returned in the collection maintained by that property is always current. 如果 为 `false`，您必须调用 以重置与上次刷新对应的时间戳。If is `false`, you must call to reset the timestamp that corresponds to the last refresh.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime Initialized { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示时间的 ，工作流运行时引擎在该时间请求了此工作流实例的第一个 。

span.span: Gets or sets a that indicates the time at which the first for this workflow instance was requested by the workflow run-time engine.

value.span: 一个指示时间的 ，工作流运行时引擎在该时间请求了此工作流实例的第一个 。

span.span: A that indicates the time at which the first for this workflow instance was requested by the workflow run-time engine.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取有关所显示工作流的列表中包含的所有 对象的信息。The following code example shows how to obtain information about all objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. 代码为 `ListViewItem` 变量中的每个 创建一个 `displayedWorkflows`。The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. 每个 都包含 、 和 属性的字符串表示形式。Each contains a string representation of the , the and properties. 然后，它将该项添加到 `workflowStatusList`。It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. 代码使用以前命名的属性值和 属性的字符串版本来创建同样会添加到 `WorkflowStatusInfo` 的新 `workflowStatusList` 对象。The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`. 此代码示例摘自 Mainform.cs 文件中的工作流监视器 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [工作流监视器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。 [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InvokedWorkflows As IList(Of SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance)

summary.span: 获取 对象的列表，这些对象与已由此工作流调用的工作流相对应。

span.span: Gets a list of objects that correspond to workflows that have been invoked by this workflow.

value.span: 对象的列表，这些对象与已由此工作流调用的工作流相对应。

span.span: A list of objects that correspond to workflows that have been invoked by this workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true`， 将为到目前为止已由此工作流调用的每个工作流实例包含一个 ；如果 为 `false`， 将为到上次 之前为止已由此工作流调用的每个工作流实例包含一个 。If is `true`, contains a for each of the workflow instances that has been invoked by this workflow instance up to the current time; if is `false`, contains a for each of the workflow instances that has been invoked by this workflow instance up until the last . 此属性的内容由包含在 SQL 数据库（由 管理）中的此工作流实例的跟踪数据确定。The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the . 此跟踪数据对应于运行时跟踪基础结构为跟踪事件发送的跟踪记录，这些事件由与此工作流实例关联的 中的跟踪点指定。This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the associated with this workflow instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid InvokingWorkflowInstanceId { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置调用此工作流实例的工作流实例的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the of the workflow instance that invoked this workflow instance.

value.span: 调用此工作流实例的工作流实例的 ，或者，如果此工作流实例未由另一个工作流实例调用，则为空 。

span.span: The of the workflow instance that invoked this workflow instance or an empty if this workflow instance was not invoked by another workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的内容由包含在 SQL 数据库（由 管理）中的此工作流实例的跟踪数据确定。The contents of this property are determined by the tracking data for this workflow instance contained in the SQL database managed by the . 此跟踪数据对应于运行时跟踪基础结构为跟踪事件发送的跟踪记录，这些事件由与此工作流实例关联的 中的跟踪点指定。This tracking data corresponds to tracking records that are sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for tracking events that are specified by the track points in the associated with this workflow instance.

summary.span: 更新此 的属性数据。

span.span: Updates the property data for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实际上不会为 加载任何数据。 does not actually load any data for the . 为了优化数据库性能， 类将按需为其集合属性加载数据。To optimize database performance, the class loads data for its collection properties on an as-required basis. 类维护每个属性的两个时间戳： 一个指示的时间的集合跟踪数据上次加载，以及另一个指示上次刷新。The class maintains two timestamps for each property: one that indicates the time that tracking data for the collection was last loaded, and another that indicates the last time the was refreshed. 当您获取某个集合属性时， 将加载在上次加载集合跟踪数据和上次刷新 之间添加到数据库的任何跟踪数据，并将此数据添加到属性保留的集合。When you get one of the collection properties, the loads any tracking data that was added to the database between the last time tracking data for the collection was loaded and the last time the was refreshed and adds this data to the collection maintained by the property. 然后，指示上次为属性加载数据的时间戳将设置为指示上次刷新的时间戳的值。The timestamp that indicates the last time data was loaded for the property is then set to the value of the timestamp that indicates the last refresh. 如果这两个时间戳相等，则在访问属性时不会为属性加载附加跟踪数据。If these two timestamps are equal, additional tracking data is not loaded for the property when it is accessed. 将与上次刷新对应的时间戳设置为 。 sets the timestamp that corresponds to the last refresh to .

span.span: Gets the status of the workflow instance.

value.span: 一个表示工作流实例的当前状态的 。

span.span: A that represents the current status of the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是基于工作流实例的跟踪数据（特别是运行时跟踪基础结构发送的工作流跟踪数据）确定的；因此 部分取决于工作流实例的 中的 对象。 is determined based on the tracking data for the workflow instance, specifically on the workflow tracking records sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure; therefore depends, in part, on the objects in the for the workflow instance. 每个 中的 都映射到其中一个 值。 in each maps to one of the values. 如果运行时跟踪基础结构没有为此工作流实例发送过工作流跟踪记录，则 为 。If no workflow tracking records have been sent by the run-time tracking infrastructure for this workflow instance, is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取有关所显示工作流的列表中包含的所有 对象的信息。The following code example shows how to obtain information about all objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. 代码为 `ListViewItem` 变量中的每个 创建一个 `displayedWorkflows`。The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. 每个 都包含 、 和 属性的字符串表示形式。Each contains a string representation of the , the and properties. 然后，它将该项添加到 `workflowStatusList`。It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. 代码使用以前命名的属性值和 属性的字符串版本来创建同样会添加到 `WorkflowStatusInfo` 的新 `workflowStatusList` 对象。The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`. 此代码示例摘自 Mainform.cs 文件中的工作流监视器 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. MemberSignature.Value: public: property long WorkflowInstanceInternalId { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个数字，可以使用该数字在此工作流实例的单独视图中查找相关记录。

span.span: Gets or sets a number that can be used to find related records in separate views for this workflow instance.

value.span: 一个可用于在此工作流实例的单独视图中查找相关记录的数字。

span.span: A number that can be used to find related records in separate views for this workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是内部联接操作。This is an internal join operation. 提供了一种更有效的方式来访问 SQL 数据库中工作流实例的数据，而不是使用工作流实例 。 provides a more efficient way to access data for a workflow instance in a SQL database than by using a workflow instance . 使用 在单独的视图中查找此工作流实例的相关记录。Use to find related records for this workflow instance in separate views. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取有关所显示工作流的列表中包含的所有 对象的信息。The following code example shows how to obtain information about all objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. 代码为 `ListViewItem` 变量中的每个 创建一个 `displayedWorkflows`。The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. 每个 都包含 、 和 属性的字符串表示形式。Each contains a string representation of the , the and properties. 然后，它将该项添加到 `workflowStatusList`。It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. 代码使用以前命名的属性值和 属性的字符串版本来创建同样会添加到 `WorkflowStatusInfo` 的新 `workflowStatusList` 对象。The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`. 此代码示例摘自 Mainform.cs 文件中的工作流监视器 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [工作流监视器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。 [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2). [!code-csharp[Wf_samples#288](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#288)] [!code-vb[Wf_samples#288](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#288)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ WorkflowType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取和设置工作流实例的 。

span.span: Gets and sets the of the workflow instance.
The of the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取有关所显示工作流的列表中包含的所有 对象的信息。The following code example shows how to obtain information about all objects contained in a list of displayed workflows. 代码为 `ListViewItem` 变量中的每个 创建一个 `displayedWorkflows`。The code creates a `ListViewItem` for each found in a `displayedWorkflows` variable. 每个 都包含 、 和 属性的字符串表示形式。Each contains a string representation of the , the and properties. 然后，它将该项添加到 `workflowStatusList`。It then adds the item to a `workflowStatusList`. 代码使用以前命名的属性值和 属性的字符串版本来创建同样会添加到 `WorkflowStatusInfo` 的新 `workflowStatusList` 对象。The code uses the previously named property values and a string version of the property to create a new `WorkflowStatusInfo` object that is also added to the `workflowStatusList`. 此代码示例摘自 Mainform.cs 文件中的工作流监视器 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the Mainform.cs file.
